title: Night people's day
brief_description: Explores the city at night with emphasis on people who work at night and their occupations. The soundtrack recreates, with human voices and sound effects, the variety of sounds of the city and its activities. Night people tell why they prefer to work at night. Photography by Bob Hillman. Vocal sound effects by Bob Kurtz and Glenn Johnson.
